A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Memorable performance by Mark Hamill playing Luke Skywalker one more time. Unfortunately he is not strong enough in the force to stop my hart being torn out. I would have laughed at this film if it wasn't Star Wars. On the bright side; it did teach me to appreciate \"The Phantom Menace\".
